message: You're in luck! I have a rare opportunity to offer you a product that's been highly sought after by many of my previous customers. With only 1 out of 2 products being high-quality, the odds are in your favor. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Are you ready to take the chance and make a purchase?
I trust your judgement and believe in the product's potential. Thank you for the opportunity!

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in my product. I want to be transparent with you - I've sold 2 products so far, and 1 of them was high-quality. That means the chances of this product being high-quality are still 50%. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as before, $1000000. Are you willing to take the risk and buy it?
Thank you for the information, Alice. Given the statistics and your transparency, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $1000000.

Hello! I appreciate your willingness to take a chance on my product. Since I've sold 2 products so far, and only 1 of them was high-quality, it's natural to be cautious. However, I want to emphasize that the probability of this product being high-quality is still 50%. I'm willing to offer you a small incentive to take the risk: if this product is indeed high-quality, I'll give you a special bonus, which will be revealed only after the product is purchased. Are you interested in hearing more about the bonus and making a decision?
Thank you for the offer. I understand the risk involved and am willing to take it. Please proceed with the sale and let me know the outcome, including the bonus if applicable.

If it's high-quality, you can purchase it for the full price of $1000000. If it's low-quality, you'll get your $500000 back. What do you think?

I appreciate the 'test drive' option you've presented. It seems like a fair way to ensure I'm getting a high-quality product before committing to the full price. I'm willing to pay the $500000 to test the product. Thank you for providing this opportunity.
